document_name: Law No. 19.657 on Geothermal Energy and its Regulation by Decree 114
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CHL/2013/CHL-2013-07-05-Law No. 19.657 on Geothermal Energy and its Regulation by Decree 114_4ee71e559d3140c536f51c3ccad5accc.pdf
document_description: This law established a special system for granting concessions for the exploration and development of geothermal energy. The Decree 114 then updated and simplified the procedure for granting concessions for geothermal energy development.
